name: Abandoned (itch) (GamingRucker)
description: Made for the Programming Theory in Action submission, but I will continue working on this game after this submission. All music and Sound Effects were found at Pixabay.com.  All models were made using Unity Primitives. Controls : Movement w, a, s, d. Mouse to Aim, left click to shoot. R key to reload, q and e to swap weapons.
